source_objects.title: Interior Design
source_objects.description: Learn how to layout your furniture, decorate, pick the right paint color, update your kitchen, and more.

items.title: Mastering Colors And Lighting In Interior Design
items.headline: All you need to know to COLOR any space professionally and LIGHT any interior space expertly
objectives_summary: Definition, objective and purpose of interior design
Fundamental of interior design: principles and elements of design
Introduction to color theory

items.title: Introduction To Space Planning In Interiors
items.headline: Learn how to plan spaces in order to ensure comfort, balance, maneuverability and of course, beautiful design.
objectives_summary: Space Planning for Interior Decorating and Design

items.headline: Learn to model and render a photorealistic Kitchen with this Archgyan Course.
objectives_summary: Understand how to use Sketchup to create Interior Scenes
Utilize Sketchup to model Fast & Efficiently
Learn the Right Way to Model & Render with Sketchup & Vray

items.title: Grow Your Business with Feng Shui
items.headline: When you enhance the Career Gua in your home/office, you create more dynamic flow and move your business toward success!
objectives_summary: By the end of this class you will have a thorough understanding of the Career Gua/sector of your home or your office or any room you lay the Bagua onto.
You will understand how placement of furniture, objects, and art in your space may be restricting your energy and holding you back from growing your business.
You will learn how to rearrange your office or workspace to attract new opportunities, wealth, and success.

items.headline: Discover how to use your Smartphone or Tablet to Control your Home Lighting, Thermostats, IP cameras, Music & Security.
objectives_summary: Explain Home Automation 2.0 (HA 2.0) and understand its benefits.
List the different types of HA 2.0 applications that you can implement.
Describe briefly the steps that are required to build an end-to-end HA 2.0 system.

items.title: Sustainable Interiors
items.headline: Green design strategies for interior fit out projects
objectives_summary: Implement green design strategies in practice
Select materials based on sustainability criteria

items.title: Popular Interior Design Styles and How To Use Them

objectives_summary: Popular Interiors Styles, Their Characteristics and How to Use Them In Interior Design

items.title: Home Design: Learn to Design your House in 3D
items.headline: Interior Design in 3D is a dream come true! Design in 3D, fast and fun. No complicated software, no installations
objectives_summary: You will get access to 20 lectures and future updates
Start your own 3D design business
Use a completly FREE platform to get the job done in MINUTES!

objectives_summary: Interior Design Modeling, Materials, Lighting and Rendering

You'll Be Able to Create Your Own Projects

objectives_summary: Find your position in the Interior Design World

objectives_summary: Introduction to Interior Design

items.title: A Complete SketchUp Guide from Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Explore your innovation and the passion as a  creative 3D designer with the SketchUp
objectives_summary: What is Sketchup, the use of Sketchup in the interior design industry.
How to model interior spaces, study scale and proportion, test different ideas, present solutions, plan spaces, and generate architectural floor plans, elevations, and sections.
How SketchUp combined with other software programs and hand-rendering tools for maximum utility and flexibility.

objectives_summary: Setup Interior Space with 3DsMax and VRay
